examples.korean: I’ve known David for 20 years. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 나는 데이비드와 20년 동안 알고 지내는 사이이다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: I’ve known David for 20 years. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: I have no objection to him coming to stay. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 난 그가 와서 지내는 데 대해 이의 없다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: I have no objection to him coming to stay. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: She found it difficult to get on with her, possibly because of the difference in their ages. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그녀는 그 여자와 잘 지내는 것이 힘들었는데 그 이유는 아마 나이 차이 때문이었을 것이다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: She found it difficult to get on with her, possibly because of the difference in their ages. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: Dave and I go back twenty years. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 데이브와 나는 20년 동안 알고 지내는 사이이다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Dave and I go back twenty years. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: The most important thing is to keep yourself occupied. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 가장 중요한 것은 계속 바쁘게 지내는 것이다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The most important thing is to keep yourself occupied. Add to Wordbook
